The biogas can most effectively be converted into usable neon energy by means of a turbine.

The gas turbine takes flammable gases. The turbine needs some time to reach maximal power, while be permanently supplied with gas, as able to store the Neon Energy. The combustion does not generate any waste.
By increasing the "ram"-value I can cause a faster generation and emission of the energy.
